entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
